title: Ep. - 282 - BELOW DECK MEDITERRANEAN SHOWRUNNER TEDDI MELLENCAMP FROM REAL HOUSEWIVES OF BEVERLY HILLS
description:
Nadine Rajabi is Below Deck Mediterranean’s showrunner. She explains what happened behind the scenes when Captain Sandy fired Hannah from the show.

 

Teddi Mellencamp from Real Housewives of Beverly Hills talks about what happened with Denise, her daughter’s recovery, and moving to Encino.


 

Reality Life with Kate Casey
